evidence.claim: Lenus Care Hospice utilizes HIPAA standards to ensure patient data privacy and security.
The company integrates with HL7 standards for health information exchange.
They implement FHIR protocols for electronic health records exchange.
The technical architecture supports direct EHR system integration using common health-tech rails.
They have security measures in place compliant with HIPAA regulations, ensuring data protection.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of using X12 transactions or clearinghouse services.
